channel.title: [PI/Exion]Dclaws turn into dwarf remains when spawned?[PI/Exion]
channel.description: Ok this is another reaosn i prefer delta over PI but, i do like PI servers just a bit. Anyways, as i have tried to spawn D claws, they turn into dwarf remains when i spawn them. I Vain I, has told me to search fora ItemDef switch statement or soemthing like that, i looked into that and... i found nothing and was wondering if anyone could help?.. my msn is..bl00dpkscape@yahoo.com as i said in my previous topic..

item.title: [PI/Exion]Dclaws turn into dwarf remains when spawned?[PI/Exion]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Hmm.

The ints/model must be elsewhere.[/quote]

not elsewhere , it’s also possible he didn’t add them at all…

item.title: [PI/Exion]Dclaws turn into dwarf remains when spawned?[PI/Exion]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

lol i was hoping that I Vain I could help me last time, but
the conversation kinda got cut off…so he didn’t really do much,
i was hoping he could this time o.O.

case 14484: // Dragon claws c.startAnimation(6000); c.specDamage = 1.25; c.specAccuracy = 1.85; c.gfx0(-1); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

[code] public boolean is2handed(String itemName, int itemId) {
if(itemName.contains(“ahrim”) || itemName.contains(“karil”) || itemName.contains(“verac”) || itemName.contains(“guthan”) || itemName.contains(“dharok”) || itemName.contains(“torag”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“longbow”) || itemName.contains(“shortbow”) || itemName.contains(“ark bow”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“crystal”)) {
return true;
}
if (itemName.contains(“godsword”) || itemName.contains(“claws”) || itemName.contains(“aradomin sword”) || itemName.contains(“2h”) || itemName.contains(“spear”)){
return true;
}
switch(itemId) {
case 6724: // seercull
case 11730:
case 4153:
case 6528:
case 14484:
return true;
}
return false;
}

/**
* Weapons special bar, adds the spec bars to weapons that require them
* and removes the spec bars from weapons which don't require them
**/[/code]

So there you have it…the ID is 14484 …still need dhelp here lol

Read full topic
